name: Warming
description:
Collect ingredients from around town and bake a cake, so your house warming party can be the best party it can be.

Made for the Global Game Jam 2019. Theme: "What home means to you".

Controls:
  • WASD - Move
  • Space -  Talk to townsfolk
  • Shift - Use your bike to move faster
Credits:
  • David Strachan: Programming
  • Craig Innes:  Dialogue + Programming, Art
  •  Alicja Ukleja - Art 
  •  Michael Gillon - Music, Art
